constraints.name: node_s_degree_k
constraints.description: 编号为 s 的节点在生成树中必须恰好连 k 条边

constraints.name: min_spanning_tree
constraints.description: 生成树的边权总和必须最小
constraints.formal: sum(weights(T)) is minimized, where T is a spanning tree

constraints.name: impossible_case
constraints.description: 如果不存在满足条件的生成树，则输出 'Impossible'
constraints.formal: if no valid spanning tree, output 'Impossible'
